titles.title: Puyallup Tribe of Indians Land Into Trust Confirmation Act of 2023
Puyallup Tribe of Indians Land Into Trust Confirmation Act of 2023
Puyallup Tribe of Indians Land Into Trust Confirmation Act of 2023
Puyallup Tribe of Indians Land Into Trust Confirmation Act of 2023
Puyallup Tribe of Indians Land Into Trust Confirmation Act of 2023
A bill to take certain land in the State of Washington into trust for the benefit of the Puyallup Tribe of the Puyallup Reservation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 118-105.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported by Senator Schatz without amendment. With written report No. 118-130.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 273.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Ms. Hageman moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 382.

At the conclusion of debate, the chair put the question on the motion to suspend the rules. Ms. Hageman objected to the vote on the grounds that a quorum was not present. Further proceedings on the motion were postponed. The point of no quorum was considered as withdrawn.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 401 - 15 (Roll no. 110).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committee.name: Senate Indian Affairs
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Hearings By (Full Committee), Referred To

bill.summary:
Puyallup Tribe of Indians Land Into Trust Confirmation Act of 2023
This act takes approximately 17.264 acres of specified lands in Pierce County, Washington, into trust for the benefit of the Puyallup Tribe of the Puyallup Reservation. Lands taken into trust shall be part of the tribe's reservation.
The United States shall not be liable for any environmental contamination that occurred on or before the date on which the land is taken into trust.
Further, the act prohibits gaming on the land taken into trust.
